attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is just another way of raising revenue for the goverment and the hangers on to the old Blaire dynasty. Prove to the nation you are going to be your own man, and scrap this waste of money it is another thing that smacks of BIG BROTHER interffering in our freedoms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
